message: If any of you guys are developing mobile apps, please let me know. Just build a site to feature mobile apps and would like to get the HN crew first whack at having their apps displayed.  Any kind of app is fine -- iphone, ipad, android, blackberry, webos, whatever.  Soft-launching at appdiem.com while we get some apps lined up to feature.  bmelton@sympodial.com
ZapOn will launch in a few weeks. Currently we have our Teaser online: http://www.zapon.com I will mail you once we are Live. Or do you take private Beta too?

Definitely email me before you launch, and we can schedule it so that you're featured on launch day.  We're a 'one app a day' (per category) sort of thing, so if it's time sensitive, let me know as early as you can.
That teaser looks GREAT, by the way.

We have just openend the Private BETA of zapon - http://bit.ly/hN4Nzu - With zapon you can communicate in real-time with other people, all based on your favorite Interests - Join us in the Interest Graph Revolution! http://bit.ly/hN4Nzu - The Launch date is not 100% yet, all depends on the App Store Overlords.
